function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge, experience, and readiness in managing pandemics","Impact":"Inability to effectively manage, contain, and mitigate the spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in public health education, preparedness exercises, and research on infectious diseases","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, disease tracking software, and telemedicine platforms","People":"Public health officials, healthcare workers, and government agencies","Owner":"Government and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Adverse impact on infrastructure due to reduced workforce and increased healthcare costs","Impact":"Disruption of public and private agencies, increased healthcare expenses, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work policies, providing financial support to businesses, and investing in healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Remote work tools, financial support systems, and healthcare management software","People":"Employers, business owners, and government agencies","Owner":"Businesses and government"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of populations with poor air quality to pandemics","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to respiratory infections and severe illness","Mitigation":"Improving air quality through emission controls, green building practices, and urban planning","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, green construction materials, and sustainable urban development tools","People":"Residents in areas with poor air quality, urban planners, and environmental agencies","Owner":"City municipalities and environmental organizations"}]}
